result.name: ordnancesurveycsw
result.notes: OS Data Catalogue, which provides Open Geospatial Consortium "Catalogue Service for the Web" (CSW) access to information about Ordnance Survey (OS) datasets, services (including APIs), and series.

organization.name: ordnance-survey
organization.title: Ordnance Survey
organization.description:
Ordnance Survey is Great Britain’s national mapping agency. It carries out the official surveying of GB, providing the most accurate and up-to-date geographic data, relied on by government, business and individuals.

OS is a government owned company, accountable to Department for Business, Innovation & Skills

https://os.uk/

result.title: OrdnanceSurveyCSW
